title: King of the kids Trump says Jackson 'treated very, very unfairly'
text:
King of the kids Trump says Jackson 'treated very, very unfairly' 2:20pm EDT - 01:01
Surrounded by reporters' children at a White House event Thursday, U.S. President Donald Trump said White House physician Dr. Ronny Jackson was ''treated very, very unfairly'' after Jackson withdrew from consideration to head the Veteran Affairs department.
Surrounded by reporters' children at a White House event Thursday, U.S. President Donald Trump said White House physician Dr. Ronny Jackson was "treated very, very unfairly" after Jackson withdrew from consideration to head the Veteran Affairs department. //reut.rs/2r6LVoe
